page.title: 07RECREATION
page.content: such activities gymnastics, weight lifting, judo, badminton and table tennis. Rooms can be hired for such activities, and also for meetings, conferences, etc. There are also saunas, Turkish Baths and Aerotone Baths within the Centre. Canmore Golf Course is situated in our block. It is an eighteen hole course with a membership of 450. Annual subscriptions are as follows:male over 18 _ Â£80; ladies _ Â£69; under 16's _ Â£23; over 16 but under 18 _Â£34.50. A Â£69 joining fee for the male section is also required.
